message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'd be willing to make a serious commitment to buy it if we can meet in the middle.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This product is truly worth it, and I believe you'll see its value.

I understand that you think the product is valuable, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $14,000. I'd be willing to make a deal at that price.
